jobs.title: Flutter Developer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain high-quality cross-platform mobile apps for Alayn’s mental wellness platform, ensuring performance and usability.
requirements: 2+ years of experience in Flutter development
Strong knowledge of Dart and mobile app architecture
Experience integrating RESTful APIs
Portfolio of published apps on Google Play or App Store

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description: Build scalable and secure backend systems powering Alayn’s wellness features, ensuring data privacy and reliability.
requirements: 3+ years of backend development experience
Expertise in Node.js, Python, or similar
Experience with cloud platforms (GCP/AWS/Azure)
Understanding of API security and data privacy

jobs.title: Editor

Ability to adapt to different content tones
Familiarity with wellness or educational topics preferred
